title: Deals: Lenovo Duet 5 OLED Chromebook $350, DJI OM 4 SE gimbal first discount, more
content:
All of today’s best deals include a new low on Lenovo’s Duet 5 OLED Chromebook at $80 off. That’s alongside the first discount on DJI’s OM 4 SE 3-axis smartphone gimbal and a Philips Hue sale from $20. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Lenovo Duet 5 OLED Chromebook $350, DJI OM 4 SE gimbal first discount, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Lenovo's latest Duet 5 OLED Chromebook is now $80 off at a new all-time low of $350, detachable keyboard in tow. Plus other deals.
